headline: Putting it all together, each field is enclosed in double quotes, separated by semicolons. The first row will be the header: "headline"
author: author

headline: Breaking News: Major Discovery in Ancient Ruins
subheadline: Archaeologists Unveil New Findings from 200-Year-Old Site
author: Dr. Maria Gonzalez
content: In a groundbreaking discovery, archaeologists have unveiled new findings from an ancient site that dates back over 200 years. The artifacts, including pottery and tools, provide significant insights into the daily life and culture of the period. Experts are calling this find a major breakthrough in understanding the region's history. 'This is one of the most comprehensive discoveries we've made,' said Dr. Maria Gonzalez, lead archaeologist on the project. The implications of this discovery could rewrite our understanding of ancient civilizations.
